SEARCH
Module JBubbleBobble
Package game.model.level

Class Level

java.lang.Object
game.model.level.Level
public class Level extends Object
The Level class represents a game level, containing information about the level's layout, enemies, bubbles, power-ups, and player interactions. It also handles collision detection and updating of game entities during the level's progression.

    • Level

      public Level(int levelNumber)
      Constructs a new Level object with the specified level number. Initializes the level's tiles, enemies, bubbles, power-ups, and fruits.
      Parameters:
      levelNumber - The number representing the current level.

    • captureEnemies

      public void captureEnemies()
      Captures enemies inside player bubbles by checking for collisions between bubbles and enemies.

    • checkLooseLife

      public void checkLooseLife()
      Checks if the player has collided with a hazard and if so, reduces the player's lives. If the player is invulnerable, they will not lose a life. If the player hits a hazard, they will become invulnerable for a set interval.

    • updateLevel

      public void updateLevel()
      Updates the state of the entire level, including the player, enemies, bubbles, powerups, and collisions.
